about_the_game:
Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op is a unique survival simulation game that takes you to the harsh world of the Middle Ages. Whether playing alone or with friends, you must keep your character alive and overcome challenges such as hunger and thirst.

In this game, where you can only build on your base area, you can gather wood and ores from the environment to upgrade both your character and your base.



Players can gather resources like emeralds, gold, and diamonds, transform them into ingots, and craft powerful weapons and armor. These upgrades strengthen characters, enhance blacksmithing skills, and provide the tools needed to overcome upcoming challenges.

Although the main character of Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op is a skilled blacksmith, survival requires farming and animal husbandry. Players must grow crops, raise animals, and fish to gather resources for both survival and crafting, ensuring their journey continues in this challenging world.



Explore three magical realms in Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op, each with unique resources for crafting powerful weapons and armor. Players must navigate dangerous paths and battle fierce enemies to access these resources and strengthen their character.


Three different themed regions are waiting for you in the game: harsh, snow-covered mountain peaks decorated with Viking culture, majestic castle-themed lands, and exotic deserts with the ancient atmosphere of Egypt. Each region has its own unique features and resources.

The goal is to grow your world by developing your blacksmithing skills and trading between the three regions. In this dangerous world full of monsters, you'll need to strategize and set up a strong defense to survive.

If you're ready, join the world of 'Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op' and create your own blacksmithing legend!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
  • Processor: Windows 8
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
  • Processor: Windows 10
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5000 MB available space

short_description: Blacksmith Simulator Co-Op is a medieval simulation that combines survival, building, and trade. Gather wood and ore to develop your base and character, forge powerful weapons, and survive across three regions themed around Snow, Castles, and Egypt. Fight monsters and grow through trade!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
